## Establishing a baseline

```{r}

data("all_causes")
d<-all_causes
unique(d$Age_Group)

d %>% group_by(Jurisdiction,date) %>% summarise(deaths=sum(Number_of_Deaths)) -> deaths
deaths$State<-deaths$Jurisdiction
pop %>% filter(State !="New York City")-> pop
deaths<-merge(pop,deaths)
deaths$deaths_per10k<-deaths$deaths/(deaths$pop/10000)

```



```{r}
deaths %>% ggplot(aes(x=date,y=deaths_per10k,group=State)) +geom_line()
```
